import os
from rapi import _helpers
from rapi import _config

from rapi._logger import log_stderr as loge
from rapi._logger import log_stdout as logo

# ALWAYS RESTART KERNEL TO CLEANUMP ENVIRON

logo.info("run with no flags: all parameters should be default")
# In test at least one commandlie parametr must be given ohterwise argparse will crash
sys.argv = ["rapi"]
Cfg = _config.CFG()
Cfg.cfg_runtime_set_defaults()
_helpers.pp(Cfg.runtime_get(["test"]))
